data.text: We are very pleased with our stay at Vida Marina hotel. Great hotel with perfect location. Really good for families. We were traveling with our 6 months old daughter. A special thanks to Shekul from housekeeping who kept our room nice everyday.
data.title: Our Dubai family vacation

data.text: Everything was perfect, the room was really clean and comfortable thank you Shekul and Aneesh! The reception team was also super helpful and reactive! The view and location is amazing, can’t wait to come back again with my family! Wonderful stay
data.title: Everything was perfect!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hi marianadiazra,

Thank you for sharing a great review.

It makes us incredibly happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Vida Dubai Marina & Yacht Club. You totally made our day!

We can’t wait to have you back for more good times at Vida!

-Jony Yadav, Management Office
owner_response.author: Jony Yadav

data.text:
We arrived at 10:00Am which was too early for the room to be ready but they allowed us to have the room early and also upgraded us to Marina view for our honeymoon which was a really nice touch. The room was lovely and clean and the bed and pillows are ridiculously comfortable. Walkable to the beach and surrounding areas and about 20-30 min drive to Dubai mall, Burj Khalifa etc. Pool is amazing and we always got sunbeds with towels provided. Gym has everything you may want or need and the bar snacks and pool drinks are very reasonable. They had offers on which meant you could have unlimited pool drinks for a set price. 
Staff can’t do enough to help you and would highly recommend this hotel!
data.title: Outstanding stay highly recommend

data.text:
I recently stayed here as I visited Dubai to attend my friend's wedding.
I got there at 10am which was too early for my room to be ready. However, Kavita and Jenny worked their magic and after about 10 minutes they had arranged a room for me. 
The room was on the 12th floor and had a lovely view of the Marina. 
Nice spacious well appointed room. 
Housekeeping wad always on point. I think the person responsible for this was Shakula, apologies if the name is incorrect.
Breakfast was a very good spread indeed and speedy service.
The rooftop bar wad busy but still the service was very top notch.
Overall a great hotel in a very desirable location.
Will deffo stay here again if I visit Dubai in the future.
data.title: A lovely hotel

data.text: Lovely hotel exllent service nice quit room hotel are very big breakfast is good gulista and minhaj are s good housekeeping is the best we enjoy our stay at Vida hotel in Dubai balcony view is amazing in the night time overall good staff here thank you
